entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with drizzle in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
